name: COOTS TV | A Microphone Micro-Game-Athon
description:
Experience all the trials and tribulations of being a cat in this Microphone Controlled Wario-Ware style micro-games collection. Use your Microphone to Meow, Hiss, and Purr like your life depends on it and complete a series of bizarre micro-games. 

The game can also be played by pressing the M(eow), H(iss), and P(urr) keys on your keyboard if you do not have a microphone available.

Created for Ludwig Jam 2023 by @johnwlivingston & @Audrey_Anne_B
